intro: Cnestis bullata, commonly known as the bullate cnestis, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered white flowers and hairy, oval-shaped leaves. It typically grows as an herbaceous perennial, often found in moist, shaded environments. Its botanical features make it a distinctive species within its native habitat.
